description: PPARGC1A silencing causes poorly metastatic melanoma cells to become invasive, while PPARGC1A rescue suppresses metastasis in human melanoma tumor samples.
citation: Luo C, Lim JH, Lee Y, et al. A PGC1alpha-mediated transcriptional axis suppresses melanoma metastasis. Nature. 2016;537(7620):422-426.
